items.title: Brother of Pat Tillman arrested on suspected arson after fiery crash: Police
items.description: It is unclear if the driver was somehow impaired.

items.title: Delta regional pilot makes 'aggressive maneuver' to avoid B-52 collision
items.description: A Delta regional jet on approach to Minot, North Dakota, made an “aggressive maneuver” to avoid a mid-air collision with a B-52 bomber.

items.title: 'When the raids started, fear spread': LA Mayor Bass on Trump's deportation efforts
items.description: On "This Week," Mayor Karen Bass detailed the impacts of ICE raids on Los Angeles and the country.

items.title: WATCH:  "The Lost Stuffy Project" reunites kids with stuffed animals lost in flooding
items.description: A nonprofit is helping to reunite children with their "lost" stuffed animals following the July 4 floods in Central Texas.

items.title: WATCH:  President Trump signs first major federal cryptocurrency bill into law
items.description: The bill outlines regulations aimed at making a specific kind of digital currency called stablecoins more accessible and mainstream.
